pullRequest.body:
Makes `List.prod_cons` a `rfl` lemma, without any axioms.

Closes https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib3/issues/161

Simplifies some hypotheses, and makes this compatible with `Nat.sum` in core (which I will subsequently remove).

---

- [x] depends on: #17220
- [x] depends on: #17222

nodes.title: Change list.prod from foldl to foldr

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - chore: use foldr in List.prod
